div.p: ( a) High-resolution C 1 s spectrum of NM-CQDs (red curve), and four fitting components (blue, magenta, green, and cyan curves). ( b) X-ray diffraction (XRD) patterns of NM-CQDs. ( c) Raman spectra of NM-CQDs and PC powder with an excitation wavelength of 532 nm. ( d) Fourier-transform infrared (FTIR) spectrum of NM-CQDs.
